text: 2019–20 PlusLiga was the 84th season of Polish Championship (20th season as professional league - PlusLiga) organized by Polish Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). During PlusLiga season 2018–19 due to Stocznia Szczecin withdrawal from the competition there was no relegation from the league at all."Stocznia Szczecin uratowała MKS Będzin" – polsatsport.pl – 08.02.2019 Ślepsk Suwałki advanced to PlusLiga for the first time in the club's history.Ślepsk Malow Suwałki rozpoczął operację PlusLiga 2019/2020 – siatka.org – 15.08.2019 ==Squads== ==Team name changes== * Aluron Virtu Warta Zawiercie → Aluron Virtu CMC ZawiercieCMC Poland Sponsorem Tytularnym Aluron Virtu CMC Zawiercie! – aluronvirtucmc.pl – 25.07.2019 * Cerrad Czarni Radom → Cerrad Enea
